n = int(input())
s = input()

count = 0

for i in range(n - 2):
    if s[i] == "A" and s[i + 1] == "B" and s[i + 2] == "C": #A,B,Cが連続するときにカウントを増やす
        count += 1

print(count)

import sys
from collections import Counter

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
S = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()

c = Counter(S)

ans = 0
for i in range(N-2):
    if S[i:i+3] == "ABC":
        ans += 1

print(ans)
